metadata.title: CVE-2019-9151 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.10.4 library. There is an out of bounds read in the function H5VM_memcpyvv in H5VM.c when called from H5D__compact_readvv in H5Dcompact.c.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
